long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sports Cast allows users to stay up-to-date with live scores and news from their favorite sports teams and leagues.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the Sports Cast extension and set the new tab search to that provided by the service. The search will be powered by Microsoft Bing.

Features include:

* See Sports Scores from all the sports leagues
* See Trending Sports News Stories
* Handy Weather Widget
* Dark Mode available  

Privacy Policy: https://openteamconsulting.com/privacy-ext
